name: fuel-react-portfolio
description: Full-stack portfolio application with FuelPHP backend and React TypeScript frontend

scripts.dev:backend: echo 'Backend runs on XAMPP Apache server'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: echo 'Please import database/schema.sql and database/seeds.sql into your MySQL database'
